languages.text: "Ты напрасно тратишь слова. Он — тень воли вашего бога-на-троне. Слепое орудие. И никогда не поймет, почему мы следуем за элантах".

traits.locale_text: "Ты напрасно тратишь слова. Он — тень воли вашего бога-на-троне. Слепое орудие. И никогда не поймет, почему мы следуем за элантах".

languages.text: "You waste your words. He is a shadow of your throned god's will — a blind weapon. And thus, he will never understand why we follow the elantach."
languages.original_text: "Ты напрасно тратишь слова. Он — тень воли вашего бога-на-троне. Слепое орудие. И никогда не поймет, почему мы следуем за элантах".

traits.locale_text: "You waste your words. He is a shadow of your throned god's will — a blind weapon. And thus, he will never understand why we follow the elantach."
"You waste your words. He is a shadow of your throned god's will — a blind weapon. And thus, he will never understand why we follow the elantach."
"You waste your words. He is a shadow of your throned god's will — a blind weapon. And thus, he will never understand why we follow the elantach."
"You waste your words. He is a shadow of your throned god's will — a blind weapon. And thus, he will never understand why we follow the elantach."
"You waste your words. He is a shadow of your throned god's will — a blind weapon. And thus, he will never understand why we follow the elantach."
"You waste your words. He is a shadow of your throned god's will — a blind weapon. And thus, he will never understand why we follow the elantach."

languages.text: 「言うだけ無駄だ。彼はお前たちの玉座の神の、意志の影―盲目の武器にすぎない。だからこそ、なぜ私たちがエランタに従うのか、決して理解できないのだ」
languages.original_text: "You waste your words. He is a shadow of your throned god's will — a blind weapon. And thus, he will never understand why we follow the elantach."

traits.locale_text: 「言うだけ無駄だ。彼はお前たちの玉座の神の、意志の影―盲目の武器にすぎない。だからこそ、なぜ私たちがエランタに従うのか、決して理解できないのだ」

languages.text: "Ihr vergeudet Eure Worte. Er ist ein Schatten des Willens Eures Gottes auf seinem Thron. Eine blinde Waffe. Darum wird er nie verstehen, warum wir dem Elantach folgen."
languages.original_text: "You waste your words. He is a shadow of your throned god's will — a blind weapon. And thus, he will never understand why we follow the elantach."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr vergeudet Eure Worte. Er ist ein Schatten des Willens Eures Gottes auf seinem Thron. Eine blinde Waffe. Darum wird er nie verstehen, warum wir dem Elantach folgen."

languages.text: « Vous gaspillez votre salive. Ce mon-keigh est une ombre de la volonté de votre dieu sur le trône, une arme aveugle. Il ne comprendra jamais pourquoi nous suivons l'elantach. »
languages.original_text: "You waste your words. He is a shadow of your throned god's will — a blind weapon. And thus, he will never understand why we follow the elantach."

traits.locale_text: « Vous gaspillez votre salive. Ce mon-keigh est une ombre de la volonté de votre dieu sur le trône, une arme aveugle. Il ne comprendra jamais pourquoi nous suivons l'elantach. »

languages.text: «Malgastas saliva. Es una sombra de la voluntad de tu dios entronado; un arma ciega. Y como tal, nunca entenderá por qué seguimos {mf|al|a la} elantach».
languages.original_text: "You waste your words. He is a shadow of your throned god's will — a blind weapon. And thus, he will never understand why we follow the elantach."

traits.locale_text: «Malgastas saliva. Es una sombra de la voluntad de tu dios entronado; un arma ciega. Y como tal, nunca entenderá por qué seguimos {mf|al|a la} elantach».

languages.text: “你这是在白费口舌。他不过是王座之神的影子，是件没有思想的武器。正因如此，他永远无法理解我们为什么愿意追随外界人。”
languages.original_text: "You waste your words. He is a shadow of your throned god's will — a blind weapon. And thus, he will never understand why we follow the elantach."

traits.locale_text: “你这是在白费口舌。他不过是王座之神的影子，是件没有思想的武器。正因如此，他永远无法理解我们为什么愿意追随外界人。”

languages.text: "Dediklerin nafile. O; tahttaki tanrınızın gölgesi, kör bir silahtan ibaret. Neden elantach'ın yolundan gittiğimizi de asla anlayamayacak."
languages.original_text: "You waste your words. He is a shadow of your throned god's will — a blind weapon. And thus, he will never understand why we follow the elantach."

traits.locale_text: "Dediklerin nafile. O, tahttaki tanrınızın bir gölgesi, kör bir silahtan ibaret. Neden elantachın yolundan gittiğimizi de asla anlayamayacak."

languages.original_text: "You waste your words. He is a shadow of your throned god's will — a blind weapon. And thus, he will never understand why we follow the elantach."
